channel.title: CNN.com - RSS Channel - App International Edition
channel.description: CNN.com delivers up-to-the-minute news and information on the latest top stories, weather, entertainment, politics and more.

image.title: CNN.com - RSS Channel - App International Edition

channel.copyright: Copyright (c) 2020 Turner Broadcasting System, Inc. All Rights Reserved.

item.title: Trump's latest attack on mask-wearing may be his worst yet
item.description: President Donald Trump likes to think of himself as a tough guy. He likes other tough guys. Masks, in the President's world, are not the sort of thing a tough guy wears.

item.title: Russia's Covid-19 vaccine generated an immune response, study says
Sweden now has one of Europe's lowest Covid-19 death rates
item.description: After an initial surge, Sweden now has one of the lowest coronavirus death rates in Europe. CNN's Max Foster looks at the country's response to the coronavirus pandemic.

item.title: Covid-19 deaths are undercounted, WHO says
Here's the problem for Trump with the story that he called dead soldiers 'losers'
item.description: On Thursday night The Atlantic published a bombshell story that alleged -- citing four anonymous sources -- that President Donald Trump had repeatedly mocked US soldiers killed in battle and skipped a visit to a veterans' cemetery in France out of concern that rainy conditions would mess up his carefully coiffed hair.

item.title: Biden fires back at Trump: My son wasn't a sucker
item.description: Democratic nominee Joe Biden issued an emotional response after the Atlantic reported that President Trump denigrated US service members. President Trump has denied the allegations in the report.

item.title: 30 days after deadly explosion, thermal imaging shows body heat in rubble
item.description: Rescue teams in Beirut are digging deeper into rubble Friday where signs of life were detected 30 days after a massive explosion destroyed much of the city.

item.title: US Marshals say they killed the suspect in the fatal shooting of right-wing activist
item.description: A Portland man who was killed Thursday night while authorities attempted to apprehend him appeared to admit he was responsible for the fatal shooting of a supporter of a right-wing group during clashes between pro-Trump groups and left-wing protesters in the Oregon city.

item.title: Trump's conduct risks a post-election crisis
Trump denies making disparaging comments about US military
item.description: CNN's Don Lemon, White House correspondent John Harwood and Lt. General Mark Hertling (Ret.) discuss the recent article in "The Atlantic" that says President Trump has consistently made disparaging remarks about the US military.

item.title: Daniel Prude's brother said he was acting erratic, suicidal before his deadly interaction with police
Massive mystery holes appear in Siberian tundra â€” and could be linked to climate change
item.description: A Russian TV crew flying over the Siberian tundra this summer spotted a massive crater 30 meters (100 feet) deep and 20 meters wide -- striking in its size, symmetry and the explosive force of nature that it must have taken to have created it.

item.title: East Wing grapples with a familiar West Wing problem: the tell-all book
item.description: On Thursday afternoon, Melania Trump entered the East Room of the White House for a roundtable discussion about drug addiction recovery. Dressed in a prim polka-dot dress, she made opening remarks and then listened as former addicts told personal stories. She was as she often is in public, calm, and for the most part expressionless.

item.title: Manhunt underway after veteran Cleveland police officer shot and killed
item.description: A police officer is dead this morning after being killed in the line of duty in Ohio, and a manhunt is underway to find the suspect or suspects who shot him.

item.title: Trump's job losses are the worst of any American president on record
Even Fox News is choosing not to cover Trump's rallies in full, but his lies are still eye-popping
item.description: A version of this article first appeared in the "Reliable Sources" newsletter. You can sign up for free right here.

item.title: A White professor says she has been pretending to be Black for her entire professional career
item.description: A professor of African and Latin American studies who portrayed herself as Black has now revealed she has been lying.

item.title: CNN Poll: Views on racism, protests grow more partisan this summer
item.description: As protests against police violence toward Black Americans continue on, public opinion about racism in American society and over the related protests are becoming more divided by party, according to a new CNN Poll conducted by SSRS.

item.title: Dr. Gupta on US mask wearing: We're reckoning with basic human decency
item.description: CNN's Sanjay Gupta discusses a new model cited by top health experts, which projects that more than 400,000 people in the US could die from coronavirus by January 1st.

item.title: Even in the US, South Asians say caste has proved hard to escape
item.description: Sam Cornelius knew that something was amiss when his job performance review unexpectedly took a huge hit one year.

item.title: One dead as firefighters battle blaze aboard oil tanker
item.description: Firefighting crews from Sri Lanka and India are working to put out a large blaze aboard an oil tanker that has been burning since Thursday, off the coast of the south Asian island nation.

item.title: Truckers warn of UK border chaos as Brexit trade talks stall
item.description: The truckers and transportation companies that bring food and medicine into Britain say the country is not prepared for the end of free trade with the European Union, which could mean severe disruption to supplies and another blow for the battered UK economy.

item.title: Experts say Trump's voter fraud claims are hollow but perilous
item.description: CNN's Drew Griffin looks into President Trump's repeated false claims that widespread voter fraud will affect the November election.

item.title: Messi will stay at Barcelona despite wanting to leave the club 'all year'
item.description: Lionel Messi says he will "continue" at Barcelona, despite wanting to go "all year," the six-time Ballon d'Or winner announced in an exclusive interview with Goal.com on Friday.

item.title: 'Hot' passenger climbs onto airplane wing
item.description: We've all experienced the frustration of being stuck on an airplane, so close to the end of the journey, yet forced to wait while some technical problem is sorted out.

item.title: Australian customs officials destroy $19,000 handbag
item.description: A shopper learned an expensive lesson when her $19,000 alligator-skin handbag was destroyed by customs officials in Australia because it entered the country without the correct import license.

item.title: David Blaine floats 5 miles above the Earth with balloons
item.description: Fifty-two helium balloons take illusionist David Blaine on a wild ride over the Arizona desert almost 5 miles up in the sky. CNN's Jeanne Moos reports on the epic stunt.

item.title: Political group tied to Kanye West campaign law firm sent voters misinformation on Biden
item.description: An Ohio-based political advocacy group that shares a Republican-allied law firm with Kanye West's political campaign is sending unsolicited mail-in ballot applications containing misinformation on Democratic candidates to voters in Pennsylvania and Minnesota -- both key battleground states for the 2020 election.

item.title: Comac C919: China takes on Airbus and Boeing
item.description: In a year of startling upheaval for the aviation industry, one seismic change, at least, had already been predicted.

item.title: This mini Buckingham Palace is now taking reservations
item.description: The real Buckingham Palace is temporarily closed. This new mobile home modeled after the Queen's residence, however, is now open and taking reservations.

item.title: F1 champion Lewis Hamilton opens up about his loneliness and 'difficult days'
item.description: Formula One driver Lewis Hamilton has opened up about his mental health struggles, admitting he has "a lot of difficult days" and suffers from loneliness on the tour.

item.title: In a Dallas living room, golf is secretly being transformed
item.description: To any passer-by, the two-storey brick exterior looks like any other on the street.

item.title: Latinos make up 60 percent of Covid-19 cases in California
item.description: Latinos make up about 60 percent of coronavirus cases in California, according to the state's department of public health, even though they constitute less than 40 percent of the state's population. CNN's Stephanie Elam explains why.

item.title: From Munich to Voyager: How an Olympic image achieved immortality
This WWII prisoner's daughter learns her family's true story
item.description: Forty-one natives of the Alaskan Aleutian Islands were taken to and imprisoned in Japan during World War II. One of whom was Theresa Deal's mother. For years, Theresa thought she understood her mother's wartime history but now she knows the truth.

item.title: To be a success, 'Mulan' may have to conquer the world
item.description: The movie industry grew up in Hollywood, but this iconic American institution is now relying on the rest of the world as it seeks to recover from a pandemic that has devastated the global box office.

item.title: Top doctor advises people to wear masks while having sex
item.description: Canada's chief public health officer is advising people to wear masks during sex and not to kiss anyone new.

item.title: Usher announces Vegas residency
item.description: Usher is headed to Sin City.

item.title: Hollywood needs a blockbuster hit in China. 'Tenet' could be it
item.description: Christopher Nolan's "Tenet" is trying to prove that the box office still has some life left in the age of coronavirus.

item.title: Dolly Parton gives marriage advice to country star
item.description: Dolly Parton shares some marriage advice with fellow country singer Gabby Barrett during an interview for Amazon Music.

item.title: Doctor: Chadwick Boseman's death shed a much needed light on colorectal cancer
item.description: It is harder because it was so sudden. It is harder because it is a disease that I know all too well. It is harder because he was young, gifted and Black. It is harder because our community has already endured so much in this cold and callous year that is 2020.

item.title: How Somalia's pirates were stopped
item.description: Not so long ago, the coast of Somalia was plagued by pirates.

item.title: Miley Cyrus opens up about Liam Hemsworth divorce
item.description: Singer Miley Cyrus talked about sobriety and her divorce from Liam Hemsworth during an interview on "The Joe Rogan Experience" podcast.

item.title: Model suggests 3,000 a day could die a day in US by December
item.description: More than 410,000 people in the US could die from the coronavirus by January 1, more than doubling the current death toll, a new model often cited by top health officials predicted Friday.

item.title: Dr. Fauci: This is the good news
item.description: Dr. Anthony Fauci, director of the National Institute of Allergy and Infectious diseases, told CNN's Jim Sciutto that he does not think people should be concerned that politics are influencing the United States' Covid-19 vaccine timeline.

item.title: WHO chief: 'Moral bankruptcy' shown in worst disaster of Covid
No cause for 'concern' after Berlusconi admitted to hospital with Covid-19
item.description: There is no cause for "concern" over the health of former Italian Prime Minister Silvio Berlusconi after he was admitted to hospital with coronavirus, his representatives told CNN.

item.title: Russia's Covid-19 vaccine generated an immune response, study says
US Defense Dept. orders military's independent newspaper to shut down
item.description: The future of Stars and Stripes, the military's editorially independent newspaper which covers issues relevant to members of the armed forces, hangs in the balance.

item.title: How an American who lost his job due to Covid-19 got roped into an apparent Russian plot
